item.description: Hi - I thought I'd invite Animal Welfare Meetup group members to join us for an event we are having at Ever After Mustang Rescue on Sept 17th. The event will include a vegan box lunch (we are a group open to anyone interested in vegan dining for a day, an hour whenever - we are NOT an exclusive group of vegans!), a tour with lots of information from Mona Jerome the founder, Katie (yes, THIS katie) and Michelle Melaragno, the director of the Maine Equine Welfare Alliance. All ages welcome, cost in $12 for the lunch with payment due by September 9th. Feel free to check out our group event at http://www.meetup.com... or contact me directly for more information at seconroy@gmail.com. You do need to let us know you are coming please! Thanks for inviting me to post, Katie and thank to all of your for your interest! Cheers! Sarah Maine Vegan Meetup Group

group.name: The Maine Animal Welfare Meetup Group

item.name: Join Maine Vegan Meetup for their visit to Ever After Mustang Rescue!
